abstract: Yahoo draws 17.5 times as much traffic to its financial news and information section and has held the category’s top spot for 19 consecutive months.
snippet: Yahoo draws 17.5 times as much traffic to its financial news and information section and has held the category’s top spot for 19 consecutive months.
lead_paragraph: GOOGLE has an outsize image as the deft master of information. Its superior technology seems to pitilessly grind up its rivals. But Google’s domination in search has proved hard for it to match in some information domains. When serving financial news and information, for example, Yahoo draws 17.5 times the traffic of Google, according to comScore Media Metrix.

headline.main: Where Yahoo Leaves Google in the Dust
headline.print_headline: Where Yahoo Leaves Google in the Dust
